attributes.action: Impose a 20 mph speed limit through the village of Bransgore, Hampshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the afternoon of 30th September 2008, yet another child was the victim of a Road Traffic Accident in Bransgore and has subsequently died of his injuries.

This tragic accident could have been avoided IF a 20mph speed limit were imposed on each of the roads that meet / intersect in the centre of Bransgore, Hampshire.

PLEASE sign here if you agree to petition for the imposition of a 20mph speed limit through Bransgore Village.

Thank you!
